name: Spotify Web Player Floating Lyrics (swpfl)
description:
Firefox extensions release of swpfl (originally a Tampermonkey userscript).
Synced lyrics with translation/romanization resizable/draggable panel, themed, opacity control. 

Translations are provided by Gemini 2.0 Flash and 1.5 Flash via the Google AI Studio API (Accessed via a remote server).
